faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about batch resizing images

items.question: Is this image resizer really free?
items.answer: Yes! Our bulk image resizer is 100% free with no limitations. You can resize unlimited images without any watermarks or restrictions.

items.question: How does batch resizing work?
items.answer: Simply upload multiple images at once, choose your resize settings (percentage, dimensions, or file size), and click resize. All images will be processed together in your browser.

items.question: What image formats are supported?
items.answer: We support JPG, JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats. You can resize images in any of these formats.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely! All image processing happens locally in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy and security. One way to demonstrate that all processing is being done locally is to load the website, disconnect from the internet, and then use the site.

items.question: Can I resize images to specific dimensions?
items.answer: Yes! You can resize by percentage, exact dimensions (width × height), or target file size. We also offer quick presets for social media platforms.

items.question: File size increased unexpectedly?
items.answer: This can happen when your settings produce highly detailed images. To keep file sizes minimal, try saving in the WebP format and set the Quality to 80% or below. If the problem persists, check the image’s pixel resolution to make sure it isn’t being upscaled.

faq.title: Image Resizer FAQ
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our free photo resizer online tool

items.question: Is this image resizer free to use?
items.answer: Yes! Our image resizer is 100% free forever with no limitations. Resize image files unlimited times without watermarks, registration, or hidden fees. The best free photo resizer online.

items.question: How do I resize image online with this tool?
items.answer: Using our image resizer tool is simple: (1) Select your photo, (2) Choose resize preset social media aspect ratio or custom adjust dimensions, (3) Download instantly. All image processing happens in your browser.

items.question: What image formats does the photo resizer support?
items.answer: Our online image resizer supports all popular formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, and WebP. You can resize photos in any format and even convert between formats while resizing.

items.question: Is this photo resizer online secure?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our image resizer tool processes everything locally in your browser. Your photos never upload to any server - they never leave your device. To test this, load our website, disconnect your internet, and the photo resizer still works perfectly.

items.question: Can I resize image to specific dimensions?
items.answer: Yes! Our image resizer offers multiple options: set exact width and height, maintain aspect ratio, or use social media presets (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and more) to resize photos perfectly for each platform. You can also use intuitive visual crop editor. Drag handles to adjust crop area, zoom in for precision, and preview changes in real-time before resizing..

items.question: What makes this the best photo resizer online?
items.answer: Our image resizer stands out: 100% free forever, no uploads (browser-based), unlimited usage, supports common formats, social media presets, exact dimension control, and maintains privacy. It's the complete photo resizer free solution.
